title: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: When removing a working set, the package view in the background immediately refilters. This behavior should be changed so that refiltering only happens when closing the working set selection dialog, not during manipulation. Additionally, pressing cancel should cancel all changes made to working sets, including cancelling the remove operation.
OB: The package view in the background refilters immediately when deleting a working set.
EB: The package view should only refilter when closing the working set selection dialog, not during manipulation. Pressing cancel should cancel any changes made to working sets, including cancelling the remove operation.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:

1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view should be filtered.
2. Open the working set dialog again and create a second working set. Delete the first working set.
